## Vacation and public holiday in Hamburg

To get vacation you should first talk to your supervisor, after you have their approval you simply send an email to Laura and Christian with the dates of your vacation. In total you have in each year 30 vacation days.

The following days are public holidays in Hamburg:

-   1st January (New Years)

-   Good Friday

-   Easter Monday

-   Ascension of Christ

-   Pentecost

-   3rd October

-   31st of October

-   25th and 26th of December (Christmas)
